ygData.subject: Re: training points and spell research
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know about spell research, but I find meditate excellent for regaining mana quickly.  I think I trained in at once and since then I have been
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know about spell research, but I find meditate excellent for regaining mana quickly. I think I trained in at once and since then I have been increasing in skill by simply meditating after battle. The better you get, the faster you can regain mana - and mana is all we got!

Tigress
-----Original Message-----
From: James <redevil000@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 26, 1999 10:12 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] training points and spell research


I'm currently level 6 and have only used one of my training points to train in meditation. I assume that once I hit a certain level I'll realize what's lacking and then train alot in that, but any suggestions would be helpful. I was also saving up for spell research. Is spell research a skill that goes up quickly? Also, what does raising the spell research skill improve? All help is appreciated. Thanks, Lott.
